BriefDescription: Number of entries allocated. Account for Any type: e.g. Snoop,  etc.
Each cycle counts number of any coherent requests at memory controller that were issued by any core.
Each cycle counts number of coherent reads pending on data return from memory controller that were issued by any core.
Each cycle counts number of valid coherent Data Read entries. Such entry is defined as valid when it is allocated until deallocation. Does not include prefetches.
Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches
Each cycle counts number of all outgoing valid entries in ReqTrk. Such entry is defined as valid from its allocation in ReqTrk until deallocation. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic.
Each cycle counts number of valid coherent Data Read entries. Such entry is defined as valid when it is allocated until deallocation. Does not include prefetches.
Total number of all outgoing entries allocated. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic.
Counts number of all coherent Data Read entries. Does not include prefetches.
